title: Missing First Win of the Day (Level 32) and Bugged Client
body:
After reaching level 32, I've noticed that the first win of the day quest doesn't refresh daily any more. In addition, every single time I log into my account, I get the "Trying To Reconnect" message. Waiting for several minutes (5-10) usually successfully logs me in, but the first win of the day quest does not reappear. I am playing on the Mac client and have tried reinstalling, initiating a full repair, and using the Hextech Repair Tool. None of these have worked.

Thanks for any help you can give.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Edit 11/14: Problem seems to have fixed itself, on both fronts...

Login happens immediately and the first win of the day is back. I feel like the two issues are connected. If the login issues happen again I will update again.

replies.body:
Yup, when I made the post I had been waiting for 2 full 24 hour periods from my last First Win mission. If the "Trying to Reconnect" error ever pops up after a login attempt, the mission doesn't seem to reappear.

 The problem is definitely tied to the connection issues (probably a preseason issue as well, not too big of a deal as far as I'm concerned). I've noticed that relogging after getting the "Trying to Reconnect" message and not getting the First Win mission usually results in the mission popping back up after a successful login.

{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

A little bit annoying, but definitely not a big deal, as the game still functions perfectly well even if the mission doesn't show up. Thanks for the response.
